languages.text: "Если ты была счастлива служить Богу-Императору в своей прежней роли, то теперь у тебя лишь прибавилось возможностей для проявления своего потенциала".

traits.locale_text: "Если ты была счастлива служить Богу-Императору в своей прежней роли, то теперь у тебя лишь прибавилось возможностей для проявления своего потенциала. Едва ли это можно назвать неудовлетворительным развитием твоей жизни".

languages.text: "If you gained satisfaction in serving the God-Emperor in your former position, then now you merely have greater opportunities to demonstrate your potential."
languages.original_text: "Если ты была счастлива служить Богу-Императору в своей прежней роли, то теперь у тебя лишь прибавилось возможностей для проявления своего потенциала".

traits.locale_text: "If you gained satisfaction in serving the God-Emperor in your former position, then now you merely have greater opportunities to demonstrate your potential."
"If you gained satisfaction in serving the God-Emperor in your former position, then now you merely have greater opportunities to demonstrate your potential."
"If you gained satisfaction in serving the God-Emperor in your former position, then now you merely have greater opportunities to demonstrate your potential."
"If you gained satisfaction in serving the God-Emperor in your former position, then now you merely have greater opportunities to demonstrate your potential."

languages.text: “如果说，你在之前的职位侍奉神皇的经历让你感到满足，那现在也并没有什么区别。只不过，你会有更多机会来展示你的潜力。”
languages.original_text: "If you gained satisfaction in serving the God-Emperor in your former position, then now you merely have greater opportunities to demonstrate your potential."

traits.locale_text: “如果说，你在之前的职位侍奉神皇的经历让你感到满足，那现在也并没有什么区别。只不过，你会有更多机会来展示你的潜力。”

languages.text: «Si ha alcanzado la satisfacción al servir al Dios Emperador en su anterior puesto, ahora simplemente tiene mayores oportunidades de demostrar su potencial».
languages.original_text: "If you gained satisfaction in serving the God-Emperor in your former position, then now you merely have greater opportunities to demonstrate your potential."

traits.locale_text: «Si ha alcanzado la satisfacción al servir al Dios Emperador en su anterior puesto, ahora simplemente tiene mayores oportunidades de demostrar su potencial».

languages.text: 「以前の地位で神帝陛下に満足して使えていたのならば、これからは自分の潜在能力を発揮する機会が増えただけだ」
languages.original_text: "If you gained satisfaction in serving the God-Emperor in your former position, then now you merely have greater opportunities to demonstrate your potential."

traits.locale_text: 「以前の地位で神帝陛下に満足して使えていたのならば、これからは自分の潜在能力を発揮する機会が増えただけだ」

languages.text: « Si faire partie des loyaux sujets de l'Empereur-Dieu vous apportait satisfaction avant, alors dites-vous que cette nouvelle opportunité vous permettra de mettre tout votre potentiel à Son service. »
languages.original_text: "If you gained satisfaction in serving the God-Emperor in your former position, then now you merely have greater opportunities to demonstrate your potential."

traits.locale_text: « Si faire partie des loyaux sujets de l'Empereur-Dieu vous apportait satisfaction avant, alors dites-vous que cette nouvelle opportunité vous permettra de mettre tout votre potentiel à Son service. »

languages.text: "Wenn Euch Eure frühere Position als Diener des Gottimperators Zufriedenheit verschafft hat, dann stehen Euch jetzt größere Möglichkeiten offen, Euer Potenzial unter Beweis zu stellen."
languages.original_text: "If you gained satisfaction in serving the God-Emperor in your former position, then now you merely have greater opportunities to demonstrate your potential."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Euch Eure frühere Position als Diener des Gottimperators Zufriedenheit verschafft hat, dann stehen Euch jetzt größere Möglichkeiten offen, Euer Potenzial unter Beweis zu stellen."

languages.text: "Önceki konumunda Tanrı İmparator'a hizmet etmek seni memnun ettiyse artık potansiyelini sergileyebileceğin çok daha büyük fırsatlara sahipsin."
languages.original_text: "If you gained satisfaction in serving the God-Emperor in your former position, then now you merely have greater opportunities to demonstrate your potential."
